properties.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
properties.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 17 at 1:07PM AKST until February 18 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Blizzard conditions occurring. Travel will be very
difficult to impossible. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to
3 inches, with localized amounts up to 6 inches, are expected.

* WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM Tuesday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 45 mph will
cause whiteout conditions in blowing snow. Significant
drifting of the snow is likely.
properties.instruction:
A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are
expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds
and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout
conditions, making travel extremely difficult.

NWSheadline: BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST TUESDAY
